ATTENTION LEE COUNTY: The deadline to apply for federal disaster assistance in Lee County is MAY 6. You can apply online at  http://DisasterAssistance.gov  or by calling 800-621-3362.

I'll be looking into possible solutions because there is absolutely no reason to short-change Gold Star families, especially their children. https://twitter.com/TaskandPurpose/status/1120749743167156225 …

Today, I headed back to Lee County to meet w/ @AlabamaEMA & folks from Smiths Station to check on the tornado recovery efforts.
